about_the_game:
The contents of this DLC are as follows:

-----------------------------------------------
[Category : QoL1 in Epic Store]
- Daily Quest [Slot +1] (500 EC)
- Daily Quest [Slot +1] (1500 EC)
- Daily Quest [Improve Rarity] (3500 EC)
- Daily Quest [Improve Rarity] (9500 EC)

[Category : Ticket in Epic Store]
- Ticket [Super Ascension] (2500 EC) ×3

[Category : Other]
- Red Ball + 1
------------------------------ Equivalent to a total of 22500EC

We packed QoL related to Daily Quest into this DLC! Completing a Daily Quest will earn you an amount of premium currency Epic Coin according to the rarity of that quest. This DLC will increase the number of quests you can challenge each day, and only rare quests that can earn more Epic Coin will appear. Earn more Epic Coin with this DLC and keep your game ahead!


Note:
- In the Epic Store, you can purchase premium items and useful QoL with the in-game currency Epic Coin.
- If you already purchased the QoL in this DLC, the Epic Coin for that QoL will be returned.
ex.) If you already purchased "Daily Quest [Slot +1]" (cheaper) in QoL1 of Epic Store before, and purchased this DLC, then you will gain its contents except for "Daily Quest [Slot +1]" (cheaper), and also additionally 500 Epic Coin.
- The number of red balls increase from the beginning of the game. In addition, the effect of Nitro is applied.
- Ticket is single-use item.
- It stacks with other DLC.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6
  • Processor: CPU Penguin 4 or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
